title: 103_hr1260
content: National Aeronautical Research and Competitiveness Act of 1993 - Directs the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration and the Secretary of Defense to: (1) establish a joint military and civilian aeronautical research and development program. (2) prepare and transmit to the Congress a five-year aeronautical research plan, and (3) establish an Aeronautical Research Advisory Committee.
